project_abstract.cdata: The project consists mainly of the provision to cattle ranchers and farm machinery contractors of long and medium-term credit and technical services for the carrying out of ranch dvelopment plans approved by a Project Director appointed by the Instituto Nacional de Tecnologia Agropecuaria (INTA) and acceptable to the Bank. The project also includes drainage and soil studies to be carried out by INTA with the help of consultants and beef marketing studies to be undertaken by the Consejo Nacional de Desarrollo (CONADE) also assisted by consultants.
